description:
misc/dist/windows: fix broken icon, other misc

fix, and shrink, the gopher icon, txt extensions
for license and readme files, minor format changes
in the wxs file

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=aa3eeba028bf ***

misc/dist/windows: fix broken icon, other misc

fix, and shrink, the gopher icon, txt extensions
for license and readme files, minor format changes
in the wxs file

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5683054

Is it possible to name the files .rtf instead of .txt?
They're not exactly text.

On Tue, Feb 21, 2012 at 12:34 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> Is it possible to name the files .rtf instead of .txt?
> They're not exactly text.

Yeah, I should have put rtf on the end of the license file, but the
readme is text.

subject: code review 5683054: misc/dist/windows: fix broken icon, other misc
